content:
I am working on getting custom encounter profile by referencing US Core Encounter profile. I have a question in this area.
Is there a way to limit mandatory search parameters via shorthand.

I'm not familiar enough with defining search parameters to give you any specific information about exactly what you want to do, but... I do know that SearchParameters are defined in FSH using the Instance keyword. The mCODE project has a few examples here: https://github.com/HL7/fhir-mCODE-ig/blob/master/input/fsh/DEF_SearchParameters.fsh
